column1: Cause we're going to shout it loud
column2: 正因如此，我们如今要竭力呐喊
column3: Even if our words seem meaningless
column4: 哪怕我们的话语毫无意义
column5: It's like I'm carrying the weight of the world
column6: 就像是承受着整个世界的重量一样
column9: 我希望某时，以某种方式
column10: That I can save every one of us
column12: But the truth is that I'm only one girl
column13: 但我 仅是孤身一人...
column14: Maybe if I keep believing my dreams will come to life
column15: 如果我坚持相信我的梦想
column30: 告诉我，上帝，你是否是在惩罚我？
column31: Is this the price I'm paying for my past mistakes
column32: 这就是我要为旧日过错付出的代价吗？
column35: I need you more than ever right now
column36: 现在我比任何时候都更需要你
column42: 就算知道毫无价值也呼唤着
